title: Aníbal Cavaco Silva - President of The Republic - Official Information Site of the Presidency of the Portuguese Republic
snippet: Aníbal António Cavaco Silva, born on 15 July 1939, in Boliqueime, Loulé (Algarve), was the 19th President of the Portuguese Republic, elected by universal suffrage at the first round in 2006 and likewise re-elected in 2011, standing as an independent candidate.

title: Aníbal Cavaco Silva - Wikipedia
snippet: Aníbal António Cavaco Silva GCC GColTE GColL GColIH (European Portuguese pronunciation: [ɐˈniβɐl ɐ̃ˈtɔni.u kɐˈvaku ˈsilvɐ, - ɐ̃ˈtɔnju -]; born 15 July 1939) is a Portuguese economist and politician who served as the president of Portugal, from 9 March 2006 to 9 March 2016, and ...

title: Biography of the Professor Aníbal Cavaco Silva - PRESIDENCIA.PT
snippet: Aníbal Cavaco Silva commenced ... Silva achieved two absolute majorities in legislative elections and exercised office as Prime Minister between 1985 and 1995....

title: Anibal Cavaco Silva | Facts & Biography | Britannica
snippet: Aníbal Cavaco Silva (born July 15, 1939, Boliqueime, Portugal) is a Portuguese politician who served as the country’s president (2006–16) and prime minister (1985–95).

title: President Aníbal Cavaco Silva
snippet: Aníbal Cavaco Silva is a Portuguese economist who served two terms as President of Portugal. His term as President spanned from 2006 until 2016. Prior to his role as P …
